tit.j: 舞鶴クレインブリッジ

sen.j: 舞鶴クレインブリッジ（まいづるクレインブリッジ）とは、京都府舞鶴市にかかる日本海側最大の斜張橋。
sen.e: Located in Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Crane Bridge is the largest cable-stayed bridge on the coast of the Sea of Japan.
Located in Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Crane Bridge is the largest cable-stayed bridge on the coast of the Sea of Japan.
Located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Maizuru Crane Bridge is the largest cable-stayed bridge on the coast of the Sea of Japan.
sen.cmt: in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefectureとしました。

sen.j: 舞鶴クレインブリッジは戦後、引き揚げの拠点となった舞鶴平湾にかかる白い斜張橋で、全長735m、水面からの高さ約95mにもなる。
sen.e: Maizuru Crane Bridge, measuring 735 m in length and about 95 m in height from water, is a white cable-stayed bridge over Maizuru Taira Bay which was the Repatriation base after the War.

Maizuru Crane Bridge, measuring 735 m in length and about 95m in height measured from the level of the water, is a white cable-stayed bridge over Maizuru Taira Bay, a repatriation base after the Second World War.
sen.cmt: Changed for clarity, grammar and punctuation.
sen.e: Maizuru Crane Bridge, measuring 735 meters in length and about 95 meters in height measured from the level of the water, is a white cable-stayed bridge over Maizuru Taira Bay, a repatriation base after the Second World War.

sen.j: 二羽のツルをイメージして設計されたもので、主塔は鶴のくちばしを、ケーブルは羽をイメージして造られた。
sen.e: It was designed in the image of two cranes; the main tower was of a beak a crane, and the cables, of wings.
It was designed to represent the form of two cranes; the main tower signifies the beak of a crane, and the cables its wings.
It was designed to represent the form of two cranes; the main tower signifies the beak of a crane, and the cables its wings.

sen.j: また観光面において語られることの多い橋であるが、この橋の完成により舞鶴市大浦地区の住民は市街地への移動が格段に改善された。
sen.e: Although it is often referred to as a scenic spot, completion of this bridge has provided residents of Oura district of Maizuru City with significantly improved access to the city area.

Although it is often referred to as scenic in itself, the completion of this bridge has also provided residents of the Oura district of Maizuru City with significantly improved access to the city area.

Although it is often referred to as scenic in itself, the completion of this bridge has also provided residents of the Oura district of Maizuru City with significantly improved access to the city area.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道舞鶴東インターチェンジより車で約20分。
sen.e: It is approximately 20 minutes by car from Maizuru-Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
It is approximately 20 minutes by car from Maizuru-Higashi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
It is approximately 20 minutes by car from Maizuru-Higashi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.

tit.j: 周辺の名所・文化施設・祭事
tit.e: Scenic spots, cultural facilities, and events in its neighborhood.
Scenic spots, cultural facilities, and events nearby.

sen.j: 舞鶴市政記念館（12棟の煉瓦倉庫群）
sen.e: The Maizuru City Commemoration Hall (12 brick warehouses)
